mapper.select: select bbb.*, FORMAT((IFNULL(bbb.settlement_amount,0) * (IFNULL(bbb.divide_proport,0) / 100)),2) real_income from ( select aaa.*, FORMAT((IFNULL(aaa.sale_price,0) + IFNULL(pay_ondemand_price,0)),2) settlement_amount from ( select e.nick_name nikeName,/*专家昵称*/ e.mobile mobile,/*专家手机号*/ e.ascription ascription,/*专家所属负责人*/ (select count(*) from tb_jc_plan p where p.ascription_expert = e.id and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'),date_format(p.create_time,'%Y%m')) =1) expert_plan_num, FORMAT((select sum(pd1.third_money) from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd1 where 1= 1 and pd1.expert_id = e.id and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'),date_format(pd1.create_time,'%Y%m')) =1 and pd1.pay_status = '2' and pd1.pay_type in('20','21','22','0')),2) sale_price, FORMAT((select sum(pd1.third_money) from tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd1 where 1= 1 and pd1.expert_id = e.id and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'),date_format(pd1.create_time,'%Y%m')) =1 and pd1.pay_status = '2' and pd1.pay_type = '99'),2) pay_ondemand_price, 20 ondemand_average, '' free_ondemand_price, e.royalty_ratio divide_proport, d.d_value expert_person_name, e.id id from tb_jc_expert e LEFT JOIN tb_jc_purchase_detailed pd ON e.id = pd.expert_id LEFT JOIN tb_jc_dictionary d ON e.ascription = d.d_key where 1 = 1 GROUP BY e.id ) aaa where 1 = 1) bbb where 1 = 1
